pattern_healthcare_admission_001.name: Patient Admission Workflow
pattern_healthcare_admission_001.description: Patient registration, pre-screening, admission approval, and room assignment process
examples: Patient registers, insurance verified, health history reviewed, infectious disease screening completed, cleared for regular ward or quarantined, room assigned, admitted
Registration, verification of insurance and records, pre-admission screening, isolation assessment, room assignment based on medical needs, official admission

pattern_healthcare_treatment_001.name: Treatment Planning Workflow
pattern_healthcare_treatment_001.description: Diagnosis, treatment planning, multi-specialist review, approval, and execution
examples: Patient diagnosed, treatment plan developed, reviewed by specialist panel, approved or modified, medications prescribed, treatment executed, patient monitored for progress
Clinical diagnosis, treatment protocol development, multidisciplinary team review, treatment authorization, prescription issuance, therapy execution, follow-up monitoring
anti_patterns: Single physician decision for complex cases

pattern_healthcare_appointment_001.name: Appointment Booking
pattern_healthcare_appointment_001.description: Appointment request, availability check, booking, reminder, and completion workflow
examples: Patient requests appointment, availability checked with provider, appointment booked, reminder sent 24 hours before, patient arrives, appointment completed and documented
Scheduling request, provider availability verification, booking confirmation, pre-appointment reminder, patient check-in, appointment completion

pattern_healthcare_billing_001.name: Patient Billing and Claims
pattern_healthcare_billing_001.description: Treatment billing, insurance claim submission, processing, and payment collection
examples: Medical charges generated, codes verified for correctness, insurance claim submitted, claim approved or denied, payment collected from patient/insurance, accounts reconciled
Service charges itemized, medical coding verification, insurance submission, claim adjudication, patient billing for copay/deductible, reconciliation

pattern_healthcare_discharge_001.name: Patient Discharge Planning
pattern_healthcare_discharge_001.description: Discharge decision, medication reconciliation, home care planning, and follow-up scheduling
examples: Patient clinically ready for discharge, medications reconciled and list prepared, home care arranged, patient education provided, follow-up appointment scheduled, patient discharged and confirmation sent
Discharge decision, medication review and preparation, home health coordination, patient instructions, specialist follow-up booking, discharge finalization
validation_rules: Home care services arranged if needed

pattern_healthcare_surgery_001.name: Surgical Procedure Workflow
pattern_healthcare_surgery_001.description: Pre-op assessment, surgical scheduling, intra-op execution, recovery monitoring, and post-op care
examples: Pre-op evaluation, surgery scheduled, informed consent obtained, surgery performed, recovery in PACU, post-op monitoring, discharge to ward with care plan
Pre-operative assessment, operating room scheduling, patient consent process, surgical procedure, immediate recovery, clinical monitoring, ongoing post-operative care

pattern_healthcare_referral_001.name: Specialist Referral Process
pattern_healthcare_referral_001.description: Specialist referral request, authorization, appointment scheduling, and findings return
examples: Primary care creates referral, insurance authorization verified and obtained, referral sent to specialist, specialist schedules appointment, evaluation completed, findings returned to PCP, integrated into care plan
Referral generation, insurance authorization process, specialist notification, appointment coordination, specialist evaluation, report generation, findings communication

pattern_healthcare_compliance_001.name: HIPAA Compliance and Auditing
pattern_healthcare_compliance_001.description: Privacy training, access logging, breach investigation, and compliance documentation
examples: HIPAA training conducted, access controls implemented, access logs monitored, breach detection checks run, investigations documented, compliance audit performed
Employee privacy training, system access restrictions, activity log monitoring, breach investigation protocols, incident documentation, compliance verification
